CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The device fabricated using PFD2TBT_10Per showed the highest PCE ( 1.51% ) among the PFD2TBT - based polymers.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. PFD2TBT
2. PFD2TBT_10Per
3. PCE (Percentage of Conversion Efficiency)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure! Here are the relevant entities in the paragraph:

1. PFD2TBT
2. PFD2TBT_10Per

These are the only entities in the paragraph that refer to a "Material Name".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PFD2TBT |
| PFD2TBT_10Per |

PN.content:

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

2. PFD2TBT (Polymer Framework Designed with Two Thienyl Bridgeheads)
3. Per (Polymer with 10% Percentage of TBT)

Sure! Here are the relevant entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties:

1. PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency)
2. PFD2TBT (Polymer Framework Designed with Two Thienyl Bridgeheads)

These are the only entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to material properties.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency) |
| PFD2TBT (Polymer Framework Designed with Two Thienyl Bridgeheads) |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The device fabricated using PFD2TBT_10Per showed the highest PCE ( 1.51% ) among the PFD2TBT - based polymers.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Property Value" entities:

1. PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency) - This is the value of the efficiency of the solar cell device in converting sunlight into electrical energy.
2. 1.51% - This is the specific value of the PCE of the device fabricated using PFD2TBT_10Per, which is the highest among all the PFD2TBT-based polymers.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency) - This is the value of the efficiency of the solar cell device in converting sunlight into electrical energy.

So, the only entity that refers to the value of a material property in the paragraph is "PCE".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to the value of material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency) |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
